Title: About Us
_yoast_wpseo_metadesc: We achieve our missions through this platform that can be accessed across all stationary and mobile devices. We believe that BBQ has more meaning to life than just a mere pastime activity. A world without BBQ smoke is a dull world.

Title: Contact
_yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Thank you for visiting BroBBQ. We're so glad to receive ideas, comments or any questions you have. If you - our Readers, have any queries, ideas or would like to get in touch with us, please give us a shot by filling in the blank fields below. We'll try to respond you as soon as possible

Title: Extensive Guides, Tasty Recipes & Advices About BBQ
_yoast_wpseo_metadesc: Let's fire up your grill and start the best BBQ Party ever along with us by BroBBQ's comprehensive guidelines, expert advice and flavor recipes. Discover your journey from grilling newbie to pitmaster

Title: 8 Primal Cuts Of Beef - The Ultimate Chart - Embed
_yoast_wpseo_metadesc: There're 8 primal cuts: Shank, Brisket, Rib, Short Plate, Flank, Round, Chuck, and Loin. Each of these are broken down into sub-primal cuts
